item.description:
Meet at 11:30 in front of the snack bar near the fort. This is at the very end of Day Blvd, and there is a large parking lot there. Walk or dive with the beach on your right till you can't go any further.

We will walk along the waterfront for an hour then head over to the parade route. The parade starts at 1:00. Afterwards we will warm up with a cool beverage in one of the local establishments!

Directions
MBTA:
Castle Island, M St. Beach - Red Line to Broadway Station, then take City Point buses #9 or #11. Walk to the right across Marine Park to the beach to the entrance of the fort.

By Car:
Castle Island - Rte. 3 to JFK Exit, follow beach along William J. Day Boulevard, Castle Island is at the end of the Causeway.
item.name: walk to the St Patrick's Day Parade
